nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.fetch
Interface FetchServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
FetchService, Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
FetchServiceImpl
public interface FetchServiceLocal
extends FetchService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
